thread.title: Rants and Raves | Ousted aide rehired
thread.title_full: Rants and Raves | Ousted aide rehired

author: courier-journal.com
title: Rants and Raves | Ousted aide rehired
text:
Topic : Former Democratic Caucus Director Elizabeth Hoffman h as been rehired for an unspecified role in City Hall less than a month after she was fired.
Ken Dicken
All I can say is WHAT GIVES? From where is the money coming? Is this a VALID use of discretionary funds, which has been opposed for years? Are there no reliable trustworthy mature candidates in Metro Louisville who are with morals?
Harold Trainer
What magic stories does she know about council and politicians that they want to hide? If that were an average citizen with no political pull she wouldn't get her job back.
Tuesday through Friday we’ll publish your thoughts and opinions from story comments or The C-J’s Facebook page.
THE COURIER-JOURNAL
Ousted Democratic aide returning to City Hall
